Song.title: Undying Love
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Rich Gunderlock, Jonathan Baird, and Ryan Baird © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [A E | A E | A E | A E]
Verse 1: [A] My ears had [E]heard of You, [A]now I have seen [A] This bit[E]ter sweetness in [A]Your agon[E]y [A] My heart [E]was far from You, but [A]You drew me [E]near [G#m] With loving [C#m]kindne[2/4 A]ss dried eve[4/4 E]ry tear
Chorus: But I can [B]see You Bearing all my [C#m]shame on the c[A2]ross I can [B]hear You cry out, “It [G#]is d[C#m]one” [A2] O [B]Jesus, Your sacrifice was [C#m]more then enough In Your [Amaj7]death I see [A]undying [E]love [| A E]
Verse 2: [A] My heart [E]is broken, I’m [A]down on my [E]knees [A] To see [E]my Savior [A]suffering for [E]me [A] But You [E]descended, [A]lifting me [E]up [G#m] Washing my [C#m]feet[2/4 A], filling [4/4 E]my cup
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 my ears had heard of you now i have seen this bitter sweetness in your agony my heart was far from you but you drew me near with loving kindness dried every tear chorus but i can see you bearing all my shame on the cross i can hear you cry out it is done o jesus your sacrifice was more then enough in your death i see undying love verse 2 my heart is broken im down on my knees to see my savior suffering for me but you descended lifting me up washing my feet filling my cup
